It’s just as pictured, but the ideal time to wear it would be in the Spring. The material is extremely thin.
Wore it to therapy because it was lightweight and soft. It was so easy to wear.
The material is so soft. The pants are a tiny bit long for me- I’m 5’2. Ordered M.
Cute set, light weight but is not true to size in fit.  Size up.  Will keep it and give to one of my adult daughters.  I bought it on sale for $13.
Really cute, fits well and love my purchase. This brand can be way off in sizing. Sometimes you order a large and it fits like a medium! You never know what you're going to get.

The material is nice soft and very comfortable
Sizing is perfect. Feels great. Unbelievable price
Comfy material but definitely size up at least 1 or 2 sizes. Not true to size at all
The set is very comfortable but it is see-through. Very thin fabric to the point I can only use as pajamas rather than lounge wear. But for $13, not too bad.
This is a great lounge outfit.  The pants aew a bit baggie, so I'll try and shrink them in the laundry.  Using a smaller size would alter the size of the top.  One of the problems of ordering sets.
I love this set! Color and size as expected.  Very comfortable, will use for lounging and travel.
Recommended this outfit. Feels nice Great for relaxing

I was skeptical because they were so cheap for both items, but I gave it a shot.  I ordered this in blue and green, both arrived today and I love them.  I'm currently wearing the green, it is a thinner material but I expected that reading other reviews. They fit true to size and are very soft.  Considering ordering more right now.
The material is amazing and comfortable. The fit is great. I am 5 3' and 160lbs and the large is perfect. It is super cute too!

Runs true to size. Very cozy. The only complaint I have is on the color.  The picture makes it look like the blue bright and it is not. I'm a little bummed about that, but I am still keeping the set and even considering buying another

Looks like pajamas, would not wear in public, not even to run to walmart.  Fabric is ok but thin.  Did not care for the colors, just not flattering.  Waist was a bit too tight.  I'm size small.  I returned these.
This set is very soft and very comfortable. It is great to lounge around the house and true to size. Would purchase again.

These are soft and comfortable! I don't think you could wear it out and about though. The model is wearing it with a purse like she is going somewhere. It's probably better to be used as pajamas or lounging around the house.
Very comfortable, light weight, movable, nice stretch.
Good quality. Soft fabric. Fit to real size. Good to wear indoors and outdoors.
Very comfortable and soft.
I bought these for my mom, and she loved them! So much so, that I ordered a second pair for her the same day they were delivered :)
These are my comfy pajamas! I love the material. The fit is true to size.
well made. Good full size. Perfict for around the house.
The fabric is wonderful and lightweight but I can't understand what is going on with the elastic in the waistband. Constantly twisted and rolling!

Cute and Good quality
Great price
These pajamas are very soft.  However, the fabric is quite thin. They would not be warm.  They might be nice for summer PJs.  Colors were true to the pictures.
This is a nice set  and I loved the color but I got the champagne and it’s see through because it’s thin
Very comfortable, affordable and true to fit.
It fits nice and is comfy. Not the absolute best but worth the price.
The pajamas do not look like pajamas .  Can be worn  to lounge in the house or sit outside.
great fit, super comfortable
They are so comfortable and true to,size!!!
Lounge pants fit great, shirt runs a little small but they are comfortable and I will get plenty of use from them.
Exactly what I was looking for. Soft and laundered well
I love this pajama set! It's very comfortable,  soft material,  fits comfortably true to size, washes well, and is well made. They ate very reasonably priced.
Love the pants!  They are perfect if you have long legs like me.  I have a 33” inseam and they fit!  Shirt is a lil snug but doable.
I purchased 1 pair and they are so soft and great fit ! I washed to make sure no shrinking or anything and they are perfect ! Turned around and got 3 more !

评论概述: Comfortable and versatile whether for sleepwear or for running errands.
评论详情: I got the Navy Army color choice of the Ekouaer Lounge Set for Women in size medium, and it has quickly become my go-to outfit for casual events and relaxing. The fit is fantastic; it feels cozy without being unduly tight or constricting, and it fits true to size. It's the perfect material for lounging about the house because it's breathable, soft, and feels great against the skin.  This set's versatility is what I find most appealing. It looks stylish and put together whether I'm wearing it as pajamas or a casual tracksuit. The jogger-style pants add a modern touch that is appropriate both indoors and out, and the design is understated but appealing. I've worn it for both casual lounging and quick errands, and it works great for both.  This is a great option if you're looking for a lounge set that's stylish enough to wear out but comfortable enough to sleep in. The fabric is soft and retains its shape after washing, feeling durable. I'm quite happy with this set and will probably purchase a second pair in a different color.

I really love this lounge set. I like it’s a t-shirt so I can wear a sweater or robe over it to stay comfy but It’s easy to adjust to different temperatures. It’s super soft and comfortable. It’s stretchy but fitted. It washes really well and I like it. The only hiccup is to be careful the color you choose. I think I would have gotten a darker color because I didn’t realize the material is somewhat see-through and my neighbor saw my underpants. However, that being said I would still recommend it because they are so comfy just be careful of the color or just stay inside.
Love this set. I’m 5’1 so the pants are pretty long, need to roll up a few times. Wash well and are comfy.

评论概述: Theeee BEST pjs you can buy!
评论详情: I am obsessed with this brand of pjs!  They are SO soft and hold up so nicely.  In a recent sale, I may or may not have bought 12 pairs🙈. Do yourself a favor and try them!
Super comfy so stylish material doesnt look cheap they have many colors and they are perfect for summer or fall .
Love these pj's. True to size, comfortable, soft material
True to size, but the material was to thin, therefore you could see thru it. (Nothing left to the imagination). But, it was soft material. Received it promptly and received a refund, no problem.
Great lounge wear for hanging around the house or even running errands around town. Washes nicely
Love this set. It’s super comfy and feels very nice

Based on previous offerings by this brand, I ordered the XL. I'm 5'4" and 210 lbs.  I normally wear a size 16. I love the color and the love the pants pockets. Outfit is well stitched and soft material. The pants have a drawstring waistband but were snug.  I could wear this during the day but it's not loose enough for me to sleep in.  Based on the fit of this particular set, I would purchase a size up if you like a looser fit.

I really like this set!  I got them to wear as pajamas.  I sized up because I like my pajamas more loose.  I'm glad that I did.  My normal size would have been too snug and unflattering.  The material is thin, the color is a bright, hot pink.  There is elastic at the ankles of the joggers.
Overall I'm happy with this! It fits well and makes me feel more presentable than I do in most of my pajamas 😄 I'm 5'7, around 140 and the medium fits nicely.

Very comfortable and breezy. I had to take the tags off because they are itchy. Fabric is very soft and pretty thin.  Waist elastic is pretty sturdy, not folding over like other pants I’ve used. The bottom elastic at the ankles is loose, I can’t even feel it but it’s still giving the look like it’s tight.  Keep in mind that since the fabric is so thin, the underwear has to be the no-show type or thongs, if not, it will definitely show.

评论概述: Feel like pajamas, look like loungewear. So comfy. Great for fall/spring "in between" seasons
评论详情: This is my 3rd or 4th PJ set I've ordered from Ekouarer brand -- I find them to be consistently good, and this is no exception. Sizing is spot on. These are the ideal "in-between" seasons pajamas. Currently, it's too cold for shorts/tank pajamas, but too warm for long sleeves and pants. The fabric on this set is on the thicker end of the light-weight spectrum. It's SUPER soft, and the tee shirt and pants combo is awesome for fall. My fav. thing about this brand is almost all of their pajamas FEEL like pajamas, but look more like loungewear. I could easily wear these if I needed to run to the store.

Super cute and fits well. True to size and looks as advertised. Cute set to lounge around in or run errands. Material is thin and quality is moderate at best but it’s cute and convenient nevertheless.
Very comfortable. Great size  I even wear this shopping
These are so soft and comfy. The elastic around the ankles is very roomy. True to size. Definitely would buy again.

These are super comfortable jammies. The fabric feels very soft and good quality. The pants are a bit long, but I am also very short (5'2"). However, it doesn't bother me because the legs have elastics on the ends that help the pants to fit, even if they are too long. The material is light and keeps you cool even on warm days. I love this set.

This is such a cute and comfy outfit! Sizing is perfect and fits as expected. The only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars is because the color is slightly darker than the picture shows which was a little disappointing, but definitely not a deal breaker.
Comfiest two piece set!

评论概述: Lightweight, super soft, comfy, thin pants
评论详情: This relaxed, stylish, comfy PJ set is great for lounging and sleeping. The top is an ultra soft knit like a lightweight T-shirt. The bottoms are not thick like sweatpants. They are slightly thinner than the top, have a firm elastic waist with functional drawstring and are soft. They run true to size and are perfect for the growing girls in our family.
This is a great outfit to be used as pajamas set. It can also be used as lounge wear too. It is well made and comfortable.

My mother is wearing these, and they are quite comfortable, but for having purchased size Small these are rather large for her petite frame.  The cinching tie band at the waist helps, but there is still a lot of material.  The material is quite comfortable but thin!  It's definitely made for lounging around the house, and she wouldn't be seen out in public wearing this as a "jogger" outfit.

评论概述: Get away with wearing pajamas all day
评论详情: These pajamas are so soft and breathable.  They look just like a comfortable 2 set.  I wear them out and about more than I wear them to bed.  They have generous sized pockets and the drawstring is adjustable.I ordered my usual size and they fit great.
Comfortable fabric. Nice stretch. Has pockets. Somewhat warm .

This set is so sporty looking on, soft against the skin and exactly true to size! Jersey knit like fabric with some stretch. Top fits nice without being too snug. Pants are so forgiving, especially with the wide elastic waist band. Nice enough for errands, comfortable enough to sleep in. Length is just perfect. As with all Ekouaer apparel, this is extremely well made. Highly w!

评论概述: Simple and convenient to lounge in at home
评论详情: This is a great lounge set. It looks very casual and is suitable to wear around the house, to sleep in or out running errands. The size is accurate and the material is stretchy and comfortable. It is stylish and athletic looking. I like the durability and that it comes with matching shirt and jogger pants with pockets. The waistband has adjustable drawstrings. They are easy to just put on and go.

I ordered this set in Champagne, size L. I am 5'8 and 140 lbs. The set is made of soft material, but the material is thin. The color was much lighter and not as vivid as the set in the listing. The set seems well made, and I have washed and dried the set with no shrinkage. This is a good set for lounging around the house, but I will not be able to wear it outside of the house due to the thin material.

评论概述: Ordered navy blue, received navy army
评论详情: In the listing photo, it shows the navy blue to be a really pretty blue. The navy army looks to be the navy blue which is darker. While I understand that colors vary depending on the computer, I can pretty much say the navy blue I wanted is not what I received. The packaging even indicated it was navy blue. Despite the color that I'm not happy with, it's a nice set. I wouldn't necessarily wear it out to do errands, I would wear it to lounge and sleep in. It's so comfortable. I actually wore it to bed last night and boy did I get a good night's sleep. I didn't wake up once. The top fits loosely. The bottoms are also loose. They are a tad long, however, since there is elastic at the ankle, I don't have issues with tripping over too much material. The material is thin but warm enough for when the weather just starts to cool down. It also has some stretch to it. I am very happy with this set and I definitely recommend. I did remove 1 star because of the color.
Very comfortable, true to size, and suitable for both lounging at home and running errands.

I accidentally ordered the wrong size and am sad about it because these are so comfortable. I gave them to my daughter to try on and the Medium was a great fit for her. She usually wears a size 6-8 or medium and loves the overall fit and feel of the fabric. I now know what to get her for Christmas. This was washed in cold water and dried on the low heat setting with no issues. This seems to run true to size and appears to be well made.

评论概述: Ekouaer Lounge Sets for Women Two Piece Pajama Set
评论详情: So happy I ordered this set.  The material is soft. It's a nice weight for a pajama set or even as a lounge set.  The set runs true to size.  I am 5' 2" 116lbs and a small fit perfectly with a little room.  It comes in several color choices so I may get a second pair.
J’aime beaucoup mais j’aurais souhaité que le chandail soit plus long.
comfort, light weight good for summer because it’s very thin

I would call this a jogger outfit, its great for lounging but I always think a lounger is one piece but this is two piece track pants and short sleeve top. The top has a round neck and addidas like stripes on the sleeve. The track pants has an elastic band and draw string. They are very comfy, 70%polyester25%rayon5%spandex I do wear these daily lounging mostly, very little jogging .  Great outfit, and the price is right $38 with %15 off coupon.
Super soft material that stays soft after lots of washings. Only negative is that you have to hang to dry.
Very soft and comfortable outfit!
Received this today and all that arrived was the pants, NO top!! Very disappointed
This pajama set is great for lounging at home, but the material is not thick enough to wear outside. I recommend sizing up if you want a looser feel, but otherwise these fit well.

This is a nice little set of t-shirt and pants made of a soft poly material. The word salad of a product title does a lot of heavy lifting from lounge to pajamas to jogger but this is definitely on the pajama/lounge side of things. The material is thin and comfortable, perfect for hanging around the house on an evening or weekend.  The striped raglan sleeve look does make it look a bit like activewear, but don't be fooled. This outfit is meant to be worn while doing the absolute minimum.

The fabric of this women pajama set is soft and breathable, making it perfect for lounging or sleeping. It’s lightweight, but still cozy. I love how stylish this set looks, even though it's designed for lounging. The jogger-style sweatpants and crewneck top make it a great outfit for casual outings as well. This set fits perfectly. The elastic waistband on the joggers is just the right amount of stretch without being too tight. The material holds up well after multiple washes without fading or pilling, and it retains its shape nicely. Would recommend this pajamas for anyone looking for a comfortable, stylish, and affordable loungewear option.
The t-shirt fit losely which is preferred for a sleep shirt.  The pants have elastic at the leg cuffs but aren't too tight which is perfect.

I'm really happy with this set.  It fits perfectly true to size, in a comfortable loose style.  I really like the cuffs at the bottom of the pants and find them to be just the right size, enough to keep the pant leg off my feet, but not to pinch in at all.  The fabric is soft and very lightweight and the whole outfit does look just like the photos, so I got exactly what I was looking for.  Overall, I'm really happy with these and they have washed really well so far.

This pajama set is visually appealing. The material is also super soft to the touch. Both inside and outside. The pockets on the pant legs are also a nice feature. Plus this outfit fits like a perfect medium. However the waistband is a bit tight which affects the comfort of the bottoms. The elastic cuffs on the pant leg also feel a bit snug. Having a loose fitting cuff would create a more relaxing fit. Overall this lounge set is stylish and easy to recommend.
This is a nice lounge set. It seems to be well made, and the material is soft and comfortable. It does fit a little baggy, which is perfect for lounging around in.

Really nice lounge set with matching pants and shirt. Soft light weight fabric. The colour is nice! I like the baseball sleeve style with the stripes on the sleeve. Got this for my niece and as 19 year old she said its nice and will wear it. She is a XL and it fits true to size.

These are great lightweight pajamas, but only if you like a solid cuff on your pants.  Its just enough to be noticeable and I am hoping I will get used to it.  I have other joggers and the cuff is more relaxed.  The rest of the fit is great and true to size.

I feel these are great lounge outfits to chill at in home or even to run quick errands in. The joggers are comfortable and not too tight and the tee shirt fits great and the colours look good. I can't really sleep in them though, because I can feel the waistband of the joggers kind of dig in and the whole outfit feels a little hot after a few hours in bed, but for a day at home, they're great

This is a very cute lounging pajama, it is also very comfortable. I really like the sporty design, and I like less that is so rich in polyester (about 70% polyester) . Luckily this is thin, because polyester is not a very breathable fibre.  The pajama top is simple and it has a good length, covering the hips well. The pijama pants have side pockets and they are also tight at the ankles (elasticised )  The fit is larger than expected, I should have definitely downsized.  I recommend that you downsize, if you find yourself in doubt or in between sizes.  Recommended  Thank you

I wanted to love these so much.  The woman in the ad looks so comfortable.  Unfortunately, I didn’t have the same experience.  I found the neckline really high and it cut into my neck.  The material feels hot and stifling.  The pants fit okay but felt too small and too big at the same time.  The material is lovely which is why I still have it stars.  I think you just have to have the right body type for this kind of loungewear and I don’t have it.

This lounge set/pajamas are cute and fit comfortably. I ordered them in my regular size and they fit well. The shade of pink is vibrant and flattering. These are great for lounging in while at home or wearing as pajamas.
Fits great. love the colour and the fabric is really soft and comfortable, glad they finally arrived&in condition/well packaged&sealed.
Love this set. Super comfy and has cuffs in the legs, fits well or true to size.

This 2 Piece Pajamas/Lounge Set is very lovely and comfortable and it also looks great. I like the short sleeves, crew neck style of the blouse and the long jogger pants combination is very nice and feels very comfortable to wear. This pajamas/lounge set is very suitable for cold seasons fall and winter because they are warm and feel great and I really like them.
I picked this up for my daughter. It’s a little loose on her, but manageable. She said it’s comfortable! and she likes that she can wear it out of the house, if need be. My daughter likes this!

I wear size large in tops and size XL in pants.  I ordered these PJs in size XL because I didn’t want the pants to be too tight.  But the fit is quite large, even the bottoms.  I feel like these PJs look pretty sloppy on me overall and a smaller size would have looked better.  But the material is soft and they are comfortable to wear.  The elastics on the pant legs are helpful to keep them from dragging on the floor.  I’ll definitely still wear these.  But if I ordered again I would get a smaller size.
Nice and comfortable set.  Great for summer- not too thick. I like that the pants has got pockets.
